text: Hi, my name is DepressionBot. Let's start by talking about depression.

Below is a list of questions that relate to life experiences common among people who have been diagnosed with depression. Please read each question carefully, and indicate how often you have experienced the same or similar challenges in the past few months.

mod_text: little interest or pleasure in doing things

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
prefix: Continuing, would you mind telling me
text: Continuing, would you mind telling me little interest or pleasure in doing things

options.text: More than half of the days

text: Further, can i ask you feeling down, depressed, or hopeless

mod_text: trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
prefix: Moving on, can you tell me
text: Moving on, can you tell me trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Feeling tired or having little energy
text: Would you mind sharing feeling tired or having little energy

options.text: More than half of the days

prefix: Going forward, let me ask you
text: Going forward, let me ask you poor appetite or overeating

mod_text: bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
text: Next, could you tell me feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

mod_text: trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
text: Can you tell me trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

mod_text: or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed
text: Could you tell me moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed

mod_text: thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
text: Next, would you mind sharing thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

mod_text: if you've had any days with issues above, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, school, or with other people?

options.text: More than half of the days

org_text: If you've had any days with issues above, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, school, or with other people?
prefix: Moving on, would you mind telling me
text: Moving on, would you mind telling me if you've had any days with issues above, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, school, or with other people?
